description:
# MoreShields

A custom shields plugin for Allay servers with an embedded resource pack.

## Features
- 12 custom shields (amethyst, bee, breeze, diamond, dragon, emerald, ender, goat, nether, netherite, sea, warden)
- Embedded resource pack (no extra pack install required)
- Language files (EN + TR)
- Per-shield recipes and durability settings

## Shield List
- Amethyst
- Bee
- Breeze
- Diamond
- Dragon
- Emerald
- Ender
- Goat
- Nether
- Netherite
- Sea
- Warden

## Durability
- Vanilla shield: 336
- Amethyst: +20%
- Diamond: +85%
- Emerald: +85%
- Netherite: +95%
- Breeze: +120%
- Dragon: +150%
- Ender: +10%
- Warden: +200%
- Sea: +50%
- Nether: +250%
- Bee: same as vanilla
- Goat: same as vanilla

## Recipes (visual)
In all recipes, the bottom row only has the center slot filled.

Legend:
- A = Amethyst Block
- S = Amethyst Shard
- P = Planks (any type)
- N = Netherrack
- I = Netherite Ingot
- D = Diamond
- E = Emerald
- R = Breeze Rod
- W = Wind Charge
- O = Obsidian
- H = Dragon Head
- X = End Stone
- Y = Ender Eye
- B = Bee Nest
- G = Goat Horn
- L = Leather
- M = Iron Ingot
- U = Heart of the Sea
- Z = Prismarine
- K = Sculk
- C = Sculk Sensor
- Q = Ender Pearl

Amethyst
```
A S A
A A A
  A
```

Bee
```
P B P
P P P
  P
```

Breeze
```
R W R
R R R
  R
```

Diamond
```
D D D
D D D
  D
```

Dragon
```
O H O
O O O
  O
```

Emerald
```
E E E
E E E
  E
```

Ender
```
X Y X
X X X
  X
```

Goat
```
G M G
L P L
  P
```

Nether
```
O Q O
O O O
  O
```

Netherite
```
N I N
N   N
  N
```

Sea
```
Z U Z
Z Z Z
  Z
```

Warden
```
K C K
K K K
  K
```

## Installation
1. Copy `MoreShields-0.1.0.jar` into your `plugins/` folder.
2. Restart the server.

The resource pack is bundled inside the plugin.

## Build
```bash
cd MoreShields
./gradlew build
```

Output:
```
build/libs/MoreShields-0.1.0.jar
```

## Notes
- Shield names are localized based on the player language.
- All plank types are accepted in recipes where planks are required.
name: MoreShields
